item.title: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!
item.dc:creator: @theunforgive theunforgive
item.description:
@theunforgive wrote:

[quote=“Scarr, post:11, topic:200176”]go to Autospawn.cfg and add the npc you want in there. Like this:

/------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 541 2291 3380 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke[/quote] thx but my server doesent have that

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

go to Autospawn.cfg and add the npc you want in there. Like this:

/------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 541 2291 3380 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke

item.title: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!
item.dc:creator: @theunforgive theunforgive
item.description:
@theunforgive wrote:

[quote=“This is not an Alt :P, post:8, topic:200176”]ctrl+f type in your talking shop npc # which u can get by looking at the side of examine
this is the code

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC #) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT GOES HERE"; } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 02:38:57 PM[/size][hr]go to autospawn.cfg copy one of the lines go to lumby get the coords put the coords in that[/quote]

where do the cords go?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!

item.title: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Autospawn.cfg

Get the coordinates in the area of lumbridge you want it in,

Then go to autospawn.cfg and for you i’d recommend just copying one of the npc’s already there,

When there change the first number to the npc id you want,

And the two numbers after that to the coordinates.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!

item.title: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!
item.dc:creator: @This_is_not_an_Alt_P This is not an Alt :P
item.description:
@This_is_not_an_Alt_P wrote:

ctrl+f type in your talking shop npc # which u can get by looking at the side of examine
this is the code

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC #) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT GOES HERE"; } }
go to autospawn.cfg copy one of the lines go to lumby get the coords put the coords in that

like this

spawn = NPC# XCORD YCORD 0 0 0 0 0 2 DESCRIPTION

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!

item.title: How do you add npc not shops and make htem say something!
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Well, if you take what This is not an alt’s suggestion (which you should). After you copy the code, look for the } near the end of the code, press enter, and paste that code you copied. But change the NPCID and the Text you want the Npc to say.
